Uses of Class
com.scivicslab.pluggablecli.HelpFormatter.Section

  • Uses of HelpFormatter.Section in com.scivicslab.pluggablecli

    Methods in com.scivicslab.pluggablecli that return HelpFormatter.Section
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static HelpFormatter.Section
    HelpFormatter.Section.commandDescription(String heading)
    Creates a section that prints the command description registered in the repository.
    static HelpFormatter.Section
    HelpFormatter.Section.custom(String heading, Collection<String> lines)
    Creates an arbitrary custom section with caller-defined content lines.
    static HelpFormatter.Section
    HelpFormatter.Section.options(String heading)
    Creates an options section that reuses HelpFormatter.printOptions(PrintWriter, int, Options, int, int) for rendering.
    static HelpFormatter.Section
    HelpFormatter.Section.usage(String heading)
    Creates a usage section that will be populated via HelpFormatter.printUsage(PrintWriter, int, String).
